seg.source: Landung auf Ryugu: Diese Aufgabe hat "Mascot" auf dem Asteroiden
seg.translation: Landing on Ryugu: These are "Mascot's" tasks on the asteroid
Landing on Ryugu: this mission has "Mascot" on the asteroid.
Landing on Ryugu: This task has "Mascot" on the asteroid

seg.source: Die Sonde "Hayabusa2" startete im Dezember 2014 in Japan.
seg.translation: The “Hayabusa2” probe launched in December 2014 in Japan.
The "Hayabusa2" probe began in Japan in December 2014.
The "Hayabusa2" probe was launched in Japan in December 2014.

seg.source: Sie soll sich dem Asteroiden Ryugu so sehr nähern, dass sie Material von seiner Oberfläche einsaugen und zur Erde bringen kann.
seg.translation: It should get so close to the asteroid Ryugu that it can suck in material from its surface and bring it back to Earth.
The probe purportedly came so close to the Ryugu asteroid that material from the surface was able to be vacuumed and brought back to earth.
It is supposed to approach the asteroid Ryugu so close that it can suck in material from its surface and bring it to Earth.

seg.source: Der Lander "Mascot" wird auf Ryugu bleiben.
seg.translation: The lander “Mascot” will remain on Ryugu.
The lander "Mascot" will stay on Ryugu.
The "Mascot" lander will remain on Ryugu.
